entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
